title: Electrical equipment installed near external gas cylinders
fullText:
Low voltage or extra-low voltage electrical equipment in or on a recreational vehicle or non-recreational vehicle, shall not be installed within the hazardous area shown in Figure 4.6.
Exception 1: Encapsulated devices may be installed within the hazardous area around gas cylinders. See Clause 4.10.3.4 for encapsulated device requirements.
Exception 2: This requirement does not apply to electrical fittings and electrical wiring mounted on a drawbar of an RV whose primary function relates to propulsion or roadâ€‘worthiness of a vehicle.
